text: Shunsuke Kikuchi (菊地 俊介, born 4 October 1991 in Saitama, Saitama, Japan) is a Japanese football player for Omiya Ardija in J2 League. ==Club career statistics== Updated to 27 December 2019.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 128 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2016J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑", 10 February 2016, Japan, (p. 66 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
